text: &gnistEnaiqva ya#j~jamuqKAdRuddhyA# aqgnErdEqvatA#yaiq naityaqShTau sA#viqtrANi# BavaqntyAhu#tirnavaqmI triqvRuta#mEqva ya#j~jamuqKE viyA#tayatiq yadi# kAqmayE#taq CandA(gm)#si yaj~jayaSaqsEnA$ &rpayEyaqmityRuca#mantaqmAM ku#ryAqcCandA(gg)#syEqva ya#j~jayaSaqsEnA$&rpayatiq yadi# kAqmayE#taq yaja#mAnaM ~Myaj~jayaSaqsEnA$-&rpayEyaqmitiq yaju#rantaqmaM ku#ryAqd-yaja#mAnamEqva ya#j~jayaSaqsEnA$-&rpayatyRuqcA stOmaq(gm)q sama#rddhaqyEtyA# - [  ] 3
